thread.section_title: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI | www.risla.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Lori
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by Lori

author: Lori
title: Lori
text:
We have used the College Planning Center of RI for our daughter when she first applied to schools. And just this year again when she will be a senior in college! We couldn't have done it without your help with the FAFSA and CSS forms.
Always well organized, and booking appointments online is very easy!
Thank you Stacy!!
